code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./FAQs.css';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import NavBar from"../NavBar/NavBar";import Footer from"../Footer/Footer";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Faqs=()=>{const[openIndex,setOpenIndex]=useState(null);const handleClick=index=>{setOpenIndex(openIndex===index?null:index);};const items=[{title:'How can I pay for my order ?',content:'Contenu de la section 1...'},{title:'Can I return an item ?',content:'Contenu de la section 2...'},{title:'How long my order will take to be delivered ?',content:'Contenu de la section 3...'},{title:'How can I change something in my order ?',content:'Contenu de la section 3...'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Helmet,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"FAQs"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Header1-Shop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image1-shop",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/FAQs/image1-faqs.jpg",alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content1-shop",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Frequently Asked Questions"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Header1-Faqs",children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-title",onClick:()=>handleClick(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:item.title})}),openIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-content",children:item.content})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Faqs;
